images.name: image1
images.description: The first MacBook was introduced by Apple in 2006, replacing the iBook series.

images.name: image2
images.description: Swift was announced by Apple in 2014 as a modern, fast, and safe programming language.

images.name: image3
images.description: The MacBook Air, released in 2008, revolutionized ultra-thin laptop design.

images.name: image4
images.description: Swift is an open-source language, and its source code is hosted on GitHub.

images.name: image5
images.description: The M1 chip, launched in 2020, brought significant performance and battery improvements to MacBooks.
